name: Custom Inquiry Form
author: Dharmesh B Panchal

sections.description: The Custom Inquiry Form Plugin has been developed with a widget that enables users to effortlessly drag and drop it onto any desired location for use. The inquiries of all users will be conveniently displayed on the options page in the WordPress backend.
sections.installation:
Please adhere to the instructions for installing the plugin.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
What is the usage of this plugin ?

We can employ this plugin to exhibit a prompt contact form through the widget section.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • latest updated version.
  • no changes.

1.1

  • Added support for WP & PHP stable version.
  • Fixed minor bugs.
